QuestData.Title: Killjoy
QuestData.Description:
Ah, yes.
I saw the leader of these giants headed back from the raid shortly after I arrived. She's celebrating their victory somewhere within the camp.
It would be a shame if someone interrupted her revelries, don't you think?
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The ringleader of the Dragonheart Outpost attack.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Meatgrinder Sotok at Scalecracker Keep.
QuestData.RewardText: The djaradin seem to have no shortage of bodies to throw in our way... but perhaps this blow shall give them pause. Well done, friend.
